creator: Volv Media
descriptionHtml:
Volv is a news & magazine app for the new generation. No bias. No clutter. Read an article in 9 seconds. All our articles explain complex matters in simple language.

We reimagined the news. A place that tells you exactly what you need to know and why it’s important. A place where no one is pushing their agenda.

We’re here to awaken the potential of a well-informed world - so we just
report the facts and you make your own decisions.

1. Bias: Fake news has never been more sensationalized than in recent times. Different media entities are constantly calling attention to different stories and echoing contradicting realities. This affects our perception of the truth and leaves the country polarized. To tackle this, we cut the bias and present the facts in short 70-word articles so that people can easily stay updated and draw their own informed conclusions. Each article can be read in at least 9 seconds.

For example:

- Left wing: The 58 most bananas lines from Trump’s Fox & Friends interview

- Right wing: Trump on Fox & Friends: House Dems looked like fools this week

- Volv (Center): Trump calls into Fox & Friends to talk about Impeachment and Ukraine

In this political climate, it’s absolutely essential that we consume news which is fair and accurate. With the power of AI, we present you with just the facts, no opinions.

2. Curation: We get you. You don’t have time. With the constant inundation of trending news and content every day, it gets difficult to keep up with the most important stories. There’s either information overload or we have a fear of missing out. So instead of having to choose, we tell you what’s important and why it’s important in brief 70 word articles, which can be read in 9 seconds each.

From political news to latest tech updates to fashion stories, we’ve got you covered. We curate articles from top publications including Forbes, USA Today, Bloomberg, Tech Crunch, Discover Magazine, Vogue, etc.

Our editors filter the most important facts from over 50+ publications so you can sharpen your conversation skills and general knowledge with our short news articles. Become the best version of yourself.

3. 9 second articles #TLDR: Spoiled by convenience and with the attention span of less than 8 seconds, we millennials are known to read just 3-5 lines of an article to get a brief understanding before we move on. To address this, we cut the clutter and rewrite the main gist of the article in maximum 70 words, so you each article can be read in 9 seconds. If a story interests you, you still have the option to read the source article by simply clicking on “read more” under the Volv article. Read less, know more.

4. Instagram meets Tinder-like UI: Our unique “flashcard” format fits a 70-word story into one screen allowing users to read the story in 9 seconds and scroll through at least 5 stories in under a minute. You can retain more information with this unique format and understand quickly with easy, clear language.

Stay informed and evolve yourself in the least amount of time.

Evolve with us.
descriptionShort: Read top news stories in 9 seconds. No Bias. No BS.

Volv is a news & magazine app for the new generation. No bias. No clutter. Read an article in 9 seconds. All our articles explain complex matters in simple language.

We reimagined the news. A place that tells you exactly what you need to know and why it’s important. A place where no one is pushing their agenda.

We’re here to awaken the potential of a well-informed world - so we just
report the facts and you make your own decisions.

1. Bias: Fake news has never been more sensationalized than in recent times. Different media entities are constantly calling attention to different stories and echoing contradicting realities. This affects our perception of the truth and leaves the country polarized. To tackle this, we cut the bias and present the facts in short 70-word articles so that people can easily stay updated and draw their own informed conclusions. Each article can be read in at least 9 seconds.

For example:

- Left wing: The 58 most bananas lines from Trump’s Fox & Friends interview

- Right wing: Trump on Fox & Friends: House Dems looked like fools this week

- Volv (Center): Trump calls into Fox & Friends to talk about Impeachment and Ukraine

In this political climate, it’s absolutely essential that we consume news which is fair and accurate. With the power of AI, we present you with just the facts, no opinions.

2. Curation: We get you. You don’t have time. With the constant inundation of trending news and content every day, it gets difficult to keep up with the most important stories. There’s either information overload or we have a fear of missing out. So instead of having to choose, we tell you what’s important and why it’s important in brief 70 word articles, which can be read in 9 seconds each.

From political news to latest tech updates to fashion stories, we’ve got you covered. We curate articles from top publications including Forbes, USA Today, Bloomberg, Tech Crunch, Discover Magazine, Vogue, etc.

Our editors filter the most important facts from over 50+ publications so you can sharpen your conversation skills and general knowledge with our short news articles. Become the best version of yourself.

3. 9 second articles #TLDR: Spoiled by convenience and with the attention span of less than 8 seconds, we millennials are known to read just 3-5 lines of an article to get a brief understanding before we move on. To address this, we cut the clutter and rewrite the main gist of the article in maximum 70 words, so you each article can be read in 9 seconds. If a story interests you, you still have the option to read the source article by simply clicking on “read more” under the Volv article. Read less, know more.

4. Instagram meets Tinder-like UI: Our unique “flashcard” format fits a 70-word story into one screen allowing users to read the story in 9 seconds and scroll through at least 5 stories in under a minute. You can retain more information with this unique format and understand quickly with easy, clear language.

Stay informed and evolve yourself in the least amount of time.

Evolve with us.
descriptionShort: Unbiased news stories curated and written for you in 9 second reads.

title: Volv

creator: Volv Media
descriptionHtml:
Volv is for the curious, yet attention-deficit generation
You want to know what’s up and be that person who can add to any conversation so you subscribe to a bunch of cool newsletters and podcasts. But, you also have 0 time + 0 patience so you just end up with a clogged inbox and guilt.
We’re you.
Volv captures the zeitgeist of this generation and empowers you to consume the best content on the internet in 9-second reads.
Also, if Elon Musk’s latest tweet is shaking up markets, you’ll be covered since all our content is in real-time.
Now you can also get insights from some of the best Gen Z voices and field experts like Public.com through their channels on Volv.
What you can expect to read on Volv:
• PENN, AMC, and other meme stock analysis
• Breaking news in real-time
• Viral trends on TikTok
• Critical political events like the Taliban taking over Afghanistan
• Latest crypto updates like why Ether may surpass Bitcoin
• Advancement of Web 3
• Hype movements like adaptogens, kombucha, CBD
If you like the 9-second bit, you can dive deeper by clicking on ‘Check it out.’ We link out to Tweets, Instagram posts, news articles, and even newsletters so you can get a better understanding of the matter.
descriptionShort: News + best content on the internet in 9-sec reads

Who is Volv for?

Anyone with access to the Internet

Volv is for anyone who needs to get the gist of a news article.

Students

Volv is for students who are studying for exams, who are overwhelmed by the information overload. This app can help them summarize information into a concise, easy to digest piece of information.

Writers

Volv is for anyone who writes frequently, and who wants to summarize their news articles for easier writing and reading.

Teachers

Volv is for teachers who want to get a gist of a long document or chapter for their students.

Institutions

Volv is also for corporations and institutions who want to condense newsletters, articles, news into a summary that is easy to digest for their employees or students.

Journalists

Volv is for journalists who want to summarize a long news article for their newspaper, magazine, or any publication.

You can also dive deeper by clicking on ‘Check it out.’ We link out to Tweets, Instagram posts, videos, news articles, and even newsletters so you can get a clear understanding of the matter.

Also seen in Entrepreneur & more.

Welcome to the world of Volv. An oasis of calm in this chaotic world. We transport you to the future of how content should be consumed - quickly, efficiently and calmly.

Volv: The Ultimate News Summarizer

Volv has taken the news summarizer game to the next level. With its customized AI-generated content tailored to an individual's interests, this news app for android helps its users to keep up with the latest news and trends. The news app ensures that its users receive notifications regarding the most relevant and important news stories through its lightning-fast nine-second nuggets that can be consumed on-the-go.

Volv isn't about unplugging – it's about staying connected on your own terms. You're not giving up on being in the loop; you're just ditching the unnecessary noise. With Volv, you're not just another mindless scroller – you're a savvy news consumer who knows how to get the deets without sacrificing your sanity.

Volv delivers all the information that one requires in a well-curated, easy-to-understand format, making it the ultimate news sidekick for everyday life. Volv simplifies the process of staying informed with its user-friendly interface that relies on top-notch technology to serve you the best.  

What to Expect on Volv:

• Dive into articles in just 9 seconds flat.

• Get the whole scoop in one screenshot – no endless scrolling needed.

• Uncover fascinating newsletters, publications, writers, etc

• Ride the hype wave of the latest trends.

• Delve into viral Twitter debates and TikTok hacks.

• Easily scroll through articles in a TikTok like format

• Get shown content that’s personalized to your taste

• Stay on top of breaking news from top-notch sources like Huffington Post, The Washington Post, Vogue, and more.

This means you can now read your favorite newsletters from Substack to Morning Brew right here on Volv, instead of them clogging up your inbox. We know about those unopened subscriptions ;)

Discover a plethora of cool content like:

• Viral trends on TikTok, Twitter, and Instagram

• Trending news

• Breaking news from The NY Times, The Washington Post, Fox News, Smart News, Politico, Feedly, and more

• Distraction and ad-free reading

• Avoid the Clickbait Trap

• Interesting newsletters

But there's more – you can dig even deeper by tapping on 'Check it out.' Volv takes you beyond the surface, linking out to tweets, Instagram posts, videos, news articles, and yes, even newsletters. 

Navigating the digital world can be a challenging feat, but with news summarizers like Volv, it's a breeze. Volv helps its users ride the digital tidal wave without getting lost in irrelevant information. It's the perfect way to stay connected and informed without feeling overwhelmed. Next time you find yourself lost in the chaos of information overload, remember that news summarizers are here to simplify the task.

• Viral trends on TikTok, Twitter, and Instagram

• Trending news

• Breaking news from The NY Times, The Washington Post, Fox News, Smart News, Politico, Feedly, and more

• Avoid the Clickbait Trap

But there's more – you can dig even deeper by tapping on 'Check it out.' Volv takes you beyond the surface, linking out to tweets, Instagram posts, videos, news articles, and yes, even newsletters. 

Navigating the digital world can be a challenging feat, but with news summarizers like Volv, it's a breeze. Volv helps its users ride the digital tidal wave without getting lost in irrelevant information. It's the perfect way to stay connected and informed without feeling overwhelmed. Next time you find yourself lost in the chaos of information overload, remember that news summarizers are here to simplify the task.
